content: wham bam thank you lamb neckwarmer by susan chang a unique twist on a simple accessory this neckwarmer knits up quickly and will keep you warm all winter long materials 1 skein lion brand wool ease thick & quick or 100 yd any super bulky weight yarn us13/9mm straight needles or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle gauge 10 st x 19 r over 4 in garter stitch directions using the long tail method co 25 sts row 1 sl1 k wise k to end repeat row 1 until 18 long or length desired bobble all sts using tapestry needle seam co and bobble edges together as shown in the photo to the right finally slip it over your head strut your stuff and look fabulous **this pattern has been provided for personal use only please do not distribute sell or reproduce this pattern in any form please do not sell any finished items made from this pattern thank you find the designer on ravelry http //www ravelry com/designers/susan chang find this pattern on ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wham bam thank you lamb neckwarmer © susan chang 2008 all rights reserved
